Container.Name: teamspeak6-server
Container.Overview: TeamSpeak 6 Server Beta - The next generation of TeamSpeak voice communication server. Includes a 32-slot Beta License that is renewed every two months during the beta period. Supports voice communication for gaming, education, business, and personal use with high security standards and excellent voice quality. If container fails to start due to permission errors, run: chmod 777 /mnt/user/appdata/teamspeak6-server/ -R

Config.Name: Server Data
Config.Description: Directory for TeamSpeak 6 server data including database, logs, and configuration files. If container fails to start due to permission errors, run: chmod 777 /mnt/user/appdata/teamspeak6-server/ -R

Config.Name: TSSERVER_LICENSE_ACCEPTED
Config.Description: Must be set to 'accept' to accept the TeamSpeak license agreement.

Config.Name: Web Query Port
Config.Description: TCP port for Web Query API (optional). Leave empty to disable.

Config.Name: TSSERVER_DEFAULT_PORT
Config.Description: Default voice port for the first virtual server.

Config.Name: TSSERVER_QUERY_HTTP_ENABLED
Config.Description: Set to 1 to enable HTTP Web Query interface.

Config.Name: TSSERVER_QUERY_HTTP_PORT
Config.Description: Port for HTTP Web Query interface.

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for the container process.

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for the container process.
